messages.mail-already-exist: This mail address is already used
messages.not-allowed: This mail address is already verified
messages.not-found: This mail address cannot be found
messages.permanent: This mail address can't be deleted
messages.not-same-password: New passwords are not the same
messages.website-size: Website must be 5 characters min. and 255 characters max.
messages.website-url: Website must be a valid site URL.
messages.color-hexadecimal: Color must be explained has hexadecimal (e.g.: #FF00AA).
messages.color-integer: Priority must be explained has number (integer).
messages.mode-wrong-format: You must select a mode for this room
messages.invalid-password: The password must be between 4 and 255 characters
messages.not-confirmed: Action authorized to verified accounts only. Verify your e-mail.
messages.notification-read-error: An error has been raised while reading notifications
messages.existing-user: This email address is already used
messages.error-try-again: Impossible to achieve this request, please try again later
messages.not-connected: Looks like there is some connection issue
messages.not-in: User is not in the discussion
messages.missing-email: You don't have an email yet

group.other-request: You can join this community only if invited by its moderators.
group.success-email: The email has been successfully added to your account. You will receive a verification e-mail.
group.mail-already-exist: This mail address is already used
group.allow-pending: An access request is already pending
group.info-request: Your contact details and your following message (optional) will be sent to the moderators of this community.
group.allowed-pending: Access to this community is by invitation, and you already have a request in progress.
group.success-request: Request sent ! You will be notified when accepted.
group.message-wrong-format: The message should be less than 200 character
group.not-confirmed: Action authorized to verified accounts only. Verify your e-mail.

room.message-membership: You are not yet a member of this discussion. Before you request membership, have a glance at this discussion access conditions

messages.roomdeop: You are no longer moderator of __name__
messages.roomdeban: You are no longer banned from __name__
messages.roomallowed: You are now authorized to join __name__
messages.roomrefuse: Your request to join __name__ has been refused
messages.groupallowed: You are now a member of  #__name__
messages.groupdisallow: You are no longer a member of #__name__
messages.grouprefuse: Your request to join #__name__ has been refused
messages.groupdeban: You are no longer banned from community #__name__
messages.groupdeop: You are no longer moderator of community #__name__

notifications.no-unread-notification: You do not have unread notification
